messages.message: Hi team- if a tabular field is referenced in a Derived field and the Derived field tries to return a non-tabular response an error is returned: `The cleaning prompt resulted in a non-tabular response which is not currently supported.` If I adjust the Derived prompt to return a tabular object I will get back a tabular response. It's unclear if this is a bug or if it's a design where if you reference a tabular field the Derived field must also return a tabular object.

I have also faced the similar issue with the tabular field. Although I have noticed if you mention the column you require from the table, the error goes away. But again full table doesnâ€™t work properly in the derived field
This is a limitation that we aim to resolve with the Data types we are doing. https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-2902
